subject: RE: City of Eugene pole attachment requests
body:
Some people who received this message don't often get email from laurie.brownmorgan@lumen.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Matt,

 

The City of Eugene has opted not to move forward with their streetlights on CenturyLink/Lumen poles.  Therefore, they did not provide the contact information to begin a contract amendment.  

 

I would suggest working with the City to establish who will be the owner of the cameras and how the attachments will be managed.  The City can reach out to me if this is their intention and we can discuss the process at that time.  

 

We are not saying no to the attachments, we just need to ensure we have a contract in place.  I apologize for not responding sooner, I was out of the office last week.  

 



 

Laurie Brown 

Lead Technical Program Manager

Lumen Joint Use Management

tel: (253) 458-6573|  

Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com 

Pronouns � She/Her

 

 

 

 

From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Monday, June 16, 2025 2:40 PM
To: Brown, Laurie <Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com>
Cc: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com>; CARTER William MD <wcarter@eugene-or.gov>; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com>; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>; Chris Regalado <chris.regalado@flocksafety.com>
Subject: Re: City of Eugene pole attachment requests

 

Hi Laurie, Hope your weekend went well. Any update on getting this process started with Lumen? Regards Matt Triana Project Manager 949-547-3560 flocksafety.?com On Wed, Jun 11, 2025 at 10:?28 AM Matt Triana <matt.?triana@?flocksafety.?com>

Hi Laurie,

 

Hope your weekend went well. Any update on getting this process started with Lumen?

 

Regards

	Hi Laurie,

	 

	Happy Wednesday. Circling up on this. Please let us know what you need from Flock in order to get the agreement process started.

	 

	Please let me know if you have any questions.

	 

	Regards

		Hi Laurie,

		 

		Understood. The agreement will be between Lumen & Flock Safety then. What do we need to do to get this process started?

		 

		Regards

		On Thu, Jun 5, 2025 at 1:06?PM Brown, Laurie <Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com > wrote:

			If the city of Eugene owns the cameras the licensing agreement will be with the City.  If the City does not own the cameras, then Flock would need a licensing agreement with CTL/Lumen.  

			 



 

Laurie Brown 

Lead Technical Program Manager

Lumen Joint Use Management

tel: (253) 458-6573|  

Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com https://urldefense.com/v3/__http:/Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com*20__;JQ!!CdLFVIQ!XI5ep5MJ80vi-znZQBaX0dsQf6fvPCRGJCtfOpLdUbP2kJhEeT8yMgjBpPdB0zWlpYPECx4J376BFNvRId314XIRijbWamuf$  

Pronouns � She/Her

 

 

			 

			 

			From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
			Sent: Thursday, June 5, 2025 12:59 PM
			To: Brown, Laurie <Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com >
			Cc: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com >; CARTER William MD <wcarter@eugene-or.gov wcarter@eugene-or.gov >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; Samantha Black <samantha.black@flocksafety.com samantha.black@flocksafety.com >
			Subject: Re: City of Eugene pole attachment requests

			 

			Hi Laurie, Is this agreement between Lumen and the city/PD or Lumen and Flock? Just want to clear up who needs to get this process started. Thank you! Matt Triana Project Manager 949-547-3560 flocksafety.?com On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 2:?33 PM Brown,

			Hi Laurie,

			 

			Is this agreement between Lumen and the city/PD or Lumen and Flock? Just want to clear up who needs to get this process started.

			 

			Thank you!

Matt Triana
Project Manager



 https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/www.facebook.com/flocksafety__;!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sQdeQm8g$ 



 949-547-3560 <tel:949-547-3560>    flocksafety.com https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/flocksafety.com?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp__;!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sYWFqLoa$ 

 

			

			 

			 

			On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 2:33?PM Brown, Laurie <Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com > wrote:

				Hello,

				 

				 

				The City of Eugene has two separate requests for pole attachments. One for police-related cameras and another for installing streetlights.

				 

				As it stands, our existing attachment license does not cover these types of attachments. Therefore, we will need to execute a new addendum to our current licensing agreement to approve these attachments. To move forward, please have the person responsible for reviewing such agreements contact me. I will then provide the initial documents that Lumen requires to draft the additional agreement. 

				 

				Once the new agreement is signed, the city will need to submit applications for camera attachments to Lumen for approval. On a related note, I am already working on the streetlight applications with William Carter, who has been included in this email for coordination within the city.

				 

				Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns.    

				 



 

Laurie Brown 

Lead Technical Program Manager

Lumen Joint Use Management

tel: (253) 458-6573|  

Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com https://urldefense.com/v3/__http:/Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com*20__;JQ!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sVy5muXf$  

Pronouns � She/Her

 

 

				 

				 

				From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
				Sent: Wednesday, June 4, 2025 1:44 PM
				To: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com >
				Cc: Brown, Laurie <Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; Samantha Black <samantha.black@flocksafety.com samantha.black@flocksafety.com >
				Subject: Re: Fw: Flock camera

				 

				Hi Laurie & Team, Circling up this joint use agreement/permitting process for the Lumen pole we are proposing a camera on. Has movement with EPD started outside of this email chain or are we still waiting on that? Please let us know what

				Hi Laurie & Team,

				 

				Circling up this joint use agreement/permitting process for the Lumen pole we are proposing a camera on. Has movement with EPD started outside of this email chain or are we still waiting on that? Please let us know what we can do to help move this process along more efficiently.

				 

				Regards

Matt Triana
Project Manager



 https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/www.facebook.com/flocksafety__;!!CdLFVIQ!WGP8PCsDNy9gj8EHLoZWKHsl1vbHYUDBgj7wHPZt2am3XQ4L6-SzpSfYlUWnh8WYrVDridMV-GDlI_hRh47ELnIp0Shhvhhr$ 



 949-547-3560 <tel:949-547-3560>    flocksafety.com https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/flocksafety.com?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp__;!!CdLFVIQ!WGP8PCsDNy9gj8EHLoZWKHsl1vbHYUDBgj7wHPZt2am3XQ4L6-SzpSfYlUWnh8WYrVDridMV-GDlI_hRh47ELnIp0ZLrOEjh$ 



				On Thu, May 29, 2025 at 2:22?PM Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com > wrote:

					Hi Laurie,

					 

					Per our conversation can you assist EPD and Flock with the permit process on this?

					 

					 

					 



Toby Rasmussen

Manager Region Operations

Outstate Oregon

Phone: 509-222-8018

tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com  

					 

					 

					 

					 

					From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
					Sent: Tuesday, May 27, 2025 2:55 PM
					To: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com >
					Cc: Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
					Subject: Re: Fw: Flock camera

					 

					Hi Tobin, Hope you're well. Is there any update on the attachment agreement process? We are progressing through the other Eugene installs and don't want anything to get held up. Please let us know if you have any questions, concerns,

					Hi Tobin,

					 

					Hope you're well. Is there any update on the attachment agreement process? We are progressing through the other Eugene installs and don't want anything to get held up.

					 

					Please let us know if you have any questions, concerns, or if it would be easiest to get on call.

					 

					Regards

Matt Triana
Project Manager

 949-547-3560 <tel:949-547-3560>    flocksafety.com https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/flocksafety.com?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp__;!!CdLFVIQ!XYoMVleI2C26F1a18CUBtXO60W8py59D3cbxHpLvarIXK7uIQkFp1P-Vp6wvcJPSmjn1lUrKnEozncrBJcSS8JTPovsM$

					On Fri, May 16, 2025 at 2:48?PM Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com > wrote:

					Thanks for the clarifying.  It looked like it was one of those two poles.

					 

					I am working with our joint use dept to get some clarification for you regarding possible attachment agreement.  Need to determine if that agreement would go through the City of Eugene or if we would need to set up an agreement with Flock.

					 

					Will let you know what I find out next week.  I may get you in contact with our joint use group next week as well.

					 

					 

					 



Toby Rasmussen

Manager Region Operations

Outstate Oregon

Phone: 509-222-8018

tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com

					Sent: Friday, May 16, 2025 2:37 PM
					To: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >
					Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
					Subject: Re: Fw: Flock camera

					 

					Tobin, Please see attached. The pole with the red highlight going up it. Matt Triana Project Manager 949-547-3560 flocksafety.?com On Fri, May 16, 2025 at 2:?33 PM Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.?Rasmussen@?lumen.?com> wrote: Matt, Can you confirm

					Please see attached. The pole with the red highlight going up it.

thread_messages.body:
Some people who received this message don't often get email from laurie.brownmorgan@lumen.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Matt,

 

The City of Eugene has opted not to move forward with their streetlights on CenturyLink/Lumen poles.  Therefore, they did not provide the contact information to begin a contract amendment.  

 

I would suggest working with the City to establish who will be the owner of the cameras and how the attachments will be managed.  The City can reach out to me if this is their intention and we can discuss the process at that time.  

 

We are not saying no to the attachments, we just need to ensure we have a contract in place.  I apologize for not responding sooner, I was out of the office last week.  

 



 

Laurie Brown 

Lead Technical Program Manager

Lumen Joint Use Management

tel: (253) 458-6573|  

Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com 

Pronouns � She/Her

thread_messages.subject: Re: City of Eugene pole attachment requests
thread_messages.body:
Hi Laurie, Is this agreement between Lumen and the city/PD or Lumen and Flock? Just want to clear up who needs to get this process started. Thank you! Matt Triana Project Manager 949-547-3560 flocksafety.?com On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 2:?33 PM Brown,

			Hi Laurie,

			 

			Is this agreement between Lumen and the city/PD or Lumen and Flock? Just want to clear up who needs to get this process started.

			 

			Thank you!

	
 https://urldefense.com/v3/__http:/flocksafety.com?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp__;!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sZ4j-nse$ 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



 https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/www.facebook.com/flocksafety__;!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sQdeQm8g$ 



 949-547-3560 <tel:949-547-3560>    flocksafety.com https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/flocksafety.com?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp__;!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sYWFqLoa$ 

 

			

			 

			 

			On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 2:33?PM Brown, Laurie <Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com > wrote:

				Hello,

				 

				 

				The City of Eugene has two separate requests for pole attachments. One for police-related cameras and another for installing streetlights.

				 

				As it stands, our existing attachment license does not cover these types of attachments. Therefore, we will need to execute a new addendum to our current licensing agreement to approve these attachments. To move forward, please have the person responsible for reviewing such agreements contact me. I will then provide the initial documents that Lumen requires to draft the additional agreement. 

				 

				Once the new agreement is signed, the city will need to submit applications for camera attachments to Lumen for approval. On a related note, I am already working on the streetlight applications with William Carter, who has been included in this email for coordination within the city.

				 

				Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns.    

				 



 

Laurie Brown 

Lead Technical Program Manager

Lumen Joint Use Management

tel: (253) 458-6573|  

Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com https://urldefense.com/v3/__http:/Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com*20__;JQ!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sVy5muXf$

Hi Tobin, Hope you're well. Is there any update on the attachment agreement process? We are progressing through the other Eugene installs and don't want anything to get held up. Please let us know if you have any questions, concerns,

					Hi Tobin,

					 

					Hope you're well. Is there any update on the attachment agreement process? We are progressing through the other Eugene installs and don't want anything to get held up.

					 

					Please let us know if you have any questions, concerns, or if it would be easiest to get on call.

					 

					Regards

					On Fri, May 16, 2025 at 2:48?PM Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com > wrote:

					Thanks for the clarifying.  It looked like it was one of those two poles.

					Will let you know what I find out next week.  I may get you in contact with our joint use group next week as well.
